thread.title: Baba Rahman not getting carried away after impressing on Premier League debut with Chelsea
thread.title_full: Baba Rahman not getting carried away after impressing on Premier League debut with Chelsea

title: Baba Rahman not getting carried away after impressing on Premier League debut with Chelsea
text:
21:10 CET Baba Rahman not getting carried away after impressing on Premier League debut with Chelsea - www.ghanasoccernet.com Baba Rahman made his Premier League debut for Chelsea on Sunday 
Ghana defender Baba Abdul Rahman is not getting carried away after impressing on his Premier League debut for Chelsea in their 2-0 win over Aston Villa on Saturday. 
The 21-year-old who arrived at Stamford Bridge this summer finally got his chance to start for the Blues in his favourite left-back position. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Do not tread on an existing path; create your path and tread to leave a mark. By: jacobutenger@yahoo.c
